pages.text: Filtered fiery essence from the Nether.$(br2)Obtained by filtering $(thing)ground Netherrack$() through a Soul Sand $(l:innovation/light_machines/hopper)filtered hopper$().

Can be used to make nether sludge, concentrated hellfire, $(l:innovation/materials/nether_coal)nether coal$(), and blasting oil when combined with other items in a $(l:innovation/burn/cauldron)cooking cauldron$().$(br2)Concentrated hellfire is used to make a $(l:innovation/burn/hibachi)hibachi$(), useful for stoking a fire.$(br2)Note: Do NOT heat with a stoked flame.
